title: llordheiros
author: llordheiros
created_time: November 16, 2023, 07:25:26 AMLast edit: December 28, 2023, 06:54:33 AM by llordheiros
content: Are you guys looking for a graphics designer?I've already worked for several crypto projects and people in terms of Graphics designing and customer service. I do gifs, intro videos, promotional videos, banners, logos, social media graphics, and Telegram stickers.PORTFOLIO LINK: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hgKcvR9a9YFlL_GVbs3zDzAh1Y34nK2_LxLpl8I1Uv0/edit?usp=sharingHere are some samples below:

comments.author: lucifur
comments.body: Hello, fellow designer! I'd suggest you put some samples here or post the link to your portfolio so possible clients can see your design style. I bet their super nice!  Goodluck with your service!

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Yes, I agree with @lucifur, you must show some of the work that you have done in your thread so people who are interested in your service may want to hire you for their work. Without samples it would be difficult for others to see that how good is your service and that's why you won't get any clients.It's always better to show your previous work when you create a thread like this because clients always want to have the best service and they can't decide the best one without seeing the samples of the work the user has already done.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: llordheiros on November 16, 2023, 07:25:26 AMAre you guys looking for a graphics designer?There are a lot of new projects coming in to promote their platform here so there's always a need of designers QuoteI've already worked for a number of crypto projects and people in terms of Graphics designing and customer service. I do gifs, intro videos, promotional videos, banners, logos, social media graphics, and Telegram stickers.We don't believe it until we see how good you are and how competitive you are you have to show something or everything you've got in your sleeve you will be left out of the competition if you are not proud of your work, a true designer flaunt their designs and clients, you just have to look on the thread of other designers to see how good and competitive they are, something that's lacking on your thread.QuoteI can send my Portfolio via inbox if you are interested.You can also DM me in my TG @cryptofreakoIf you're offering other services you can offer, this but not if you're a graphic designer, a graphic designer doesn't run their business like this, and you will be left out of the competition here.

comments.author: llordheiros
comments.body: I read through your advice everyone and I truly appreciate it.I'll attach my portfolio link in my thread above too. Thank you!

comments.author: llordheiros
comments.body: Quote from: lucifur on November 16, 2023, 12:37:46 PMHello, fellow designer! I'd suggest you put some samples here or post the link to your portfolio so possible clients can see your design style. I bet their super nice!  Goodluck with your service!Thanks for the tip bro

comments.author: llordheiros
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 16, 2023, 02:03:50 PMQuote from: llordheiros on November 16, 2023, 07:25:26 AMAre you guys looking for a graphics designer?There are a lot of new projects coming in to promote their platform here so there's always a need of designers QuoteI've already worked for a number of crypto projects and people in terms of Graphics designing and customer service. I do gifs, intro videos, promotional videos, banners, logos, social media graphics, and Telegram stickers.We don't believe it until we see how good you are and how competitive you are you have to show something or everything you've got in your sleeve you will be left out of the competition if you are not proud of your work, a true designer flaunt their designs and clients, you just have to look on the thread of other designers to see how good and competitive they are, something that's lacking on your thread.QuoteI can send my Portfolio via inbox if you are interested.You can also DM me in my TG @cryptofreakoIf you're offering other services you can offer, this but not if you're a graphic designer, a graphic designer doesn't run their business like this, and you will be left out of the competition here.Thanks for your input Of course, I am proud of my design. Was just kinda hesitant to share my link through the thread. Didn't think that it would get that kind of impression.I shared it now tho. Here it is if you wanna take a peek.https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1hgKcvR9a9YFlL_GVbs3zDzAh1Y34nK2_LxLpl8I1Uv0/edit#slide=id.pI'll be glad to hear your feedback.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: You have not replied to this post for two months and now you are post-bursting with your replies, you should merge all your posts there's no need to reply to these posts individually, you are already a Member rank you should know better, you can get your account ban if you continue to do this. Consider this friendly advice, and nice work.

comments.author: llordheiros
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on December 28, 2023, 11:30:15 AMYou have not replied to this post for two months and now you are post-bursting with your replies, you should merge all your posts there's no need to reply to these posts individually, you are already a Member rank you should know better, you can get your account ban if you continue to do this. Consider this friendly advice, and nice work.Thank you very much for the advice. I appreciate it.
